original_title:
Listen to how rabid the Democrats are for crime - yelling at Pete Hegseth, JD Vance and Stephen Miller.

"F*CK you, Pete! F*ck you, N@zi!"

"Get the F*CK, out, of, my, CITY!!"  — The Donald
article_summary: Democrats and Republicans engage in heated debates, with some Democrats expressing aggressive language towards conservative figures. The article suggests that this behavior is a result of a culture that discourages discipline and promotes anti-bullying, leading to increased violence and disrespect. Some commenters advocate for physical discipline as a solution.</s>
